content.body: For cross-origin fetches, I agree that we should use different connections for CORS and no-CORS resources. But Chromium uses different pools even for same-origin fetches, because of something related to how the redirects work that I don't quite remember now
So cors anonymous same-origin fetches do happen with credentials, but over a different connection than a no-cors same-origin fetch
I don't think you need to use different connections for CORS and no-CORS? Connections are keyed on credentials, not CORS.
